sentences.en: An undisturbed object continues to move uniformly in a straight line.
sentences.cn: 未受干扰的物体继续沿直线匀速前进.

sentences.en: Beyond the windows, a November midday was uniformly grey.
sentences.cn: 往窗外望去，11月的中午始终都是灰蒙蒙的。

sentences.en: Car pets , once rich and uniformly springy, were thinning in paths.
sentences.cn: 那一度色彩绚丽, 富有弹性的地毯, 现在有的地方已经越磨越薄了.

sentences.en: Fluid stains do not spread uniformly even over smooth single fibers.
sentences.cn: 流体污垢即使在光滑的单纤维上面也不会均匀分布.

sentences.en: Heaters must be distributed uniformly around the orchard.
sentences.cn: 加热器必须均匀地分布于园内.

sentences.en: In an uniform field, the lines of force are straight parallel, and uniformly spaced.
sentences.cn: 在匀强电场中, 电力线是平行的直线, 其间隔是均匀的.
微波炉能把水均匀加热。

sentences.en: Reaction to the cuts was uniformly negative.
sentences.cn: 对削减经费一事一律持反对态度.

sentences.en: The machine is capable of processing 500 mm square plates very uniformly.
sentences.cn: 这种机器可用来冲洗500毫米见方的底片,并得到很均匀的效果.

sentences.en: The natives uniformly agreed on this important point.
sentences.cn: 当地人在这一要点上达成了共识。

sentences.en: The once - green fields were now uniformly brown.
sentences.cn: 曾经的绿地现在变成了一片褐色.

sentences.en: The performances and recordings are uniformly excellent.
The principles were applied uniformly across all the departments.
sentences.cn: 这些原则统一适用于所有部门。

sentences.en: The simplest imposed conditions are those in which the loading is periodically and uniformly repeated.
sentences.cn: 最简单的加载情况是周期地、均匀而重复地施加的载荷.

sentences.en: They are all about twenty years old, serious, smart, a bit conventional perhaps, but uniformly pleasant.
sentences.cn: 他们全部20岁左右，严肃、聪明，也许还有点传统，但是都很讨人喜欢。

words.tran_cn: 统一的；一致的；相同的；均衡的；始终如一的

trans.tran_en: not varying; the same in all parts and at all times
